attributes.action: Isle of wight's first concrete skate park
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to get a well built concrete skate park built on the isle of wight.

Please get involved and support this petition!
The island is desperately in need of a safe and well built park. Where ramp's, ledge's, rail's etc! are built specifically for theses type's of sport's. That can be benefit all age's!

Please sign and help support your local community
Thank you

rejection.details: For the local authority to act on.
